typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Employee_Data as (Id as string, Name as string, Dep as string, Salary as string, Projects as (ProjectId as string, Role as string)[])[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(Employee_Data),
	mapColumn(
		Id = Employee_Data,
		Name = Employee_Data,
		Dep = Employee_Data,
		Salary = Employee_Data
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
